We would offer more if requested . Diffferent sessions offer different alternative activities.

properties.address: St Germans Eliot Hall St Germans Cornwall PL12 5NL
properties.contact: To book or make an enquiry, contact Casey the yoga teacher at 07913 684253 / www.caseygemma.com.
properties.description:
Free Gentle Yoga Sessions
There will be 4 more free Gentle Yoga sessions with Casey in February and March 2023. The sessions have proved to be really successful, and we have enjoyed having a good stretch, feeling a bit more flexible and calming our busy minds. There are still spaces at the current sessions which run on Tuesdays at Eliot Hall from 10.30am – 11.30am until Tuesday 31st January. We have 45mins of Gentle Yoga (this can be done seated or standing, yoga mats are provided) followed by 15mins for a hot drink and a chat at the end.
